mdRecord.dcterms:title: Henrie Van Leester, Class of 1911, Storer College, Harpers Ferry, W. Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Portrait of Henrie Van Leester from Suriname, Dutch Giana. Back of photo says, 'Mr. McDonald, This is my boy whom you may expect soon. Henrie Van Leester. S. A. Esterbrook.'
